original_text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. He said unto them, He put clay upon mine eyes, and I washed, and do see.
korean_text: 그러므로 바리새인들도 그가 어떻게 보게 되었는지를 물으니 이르되 그 사람이 진흙을 내 눈에 바르매 내가 씻고 보나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 바리새인들이 그에게 다시 물었으니

sentences.original_text: how he had received his sight
He put clay upon mine eyes
